<s> John Barry and his Doings--On the Ship Norman--Madeira--Arrived in Southampton FOLLOWING THE EQUATOR CHAPTER I </s>
<s> A man may have no bad habits and have worse </s>
<s> --Pudd'nhead Wilson's New Calendar </s>
<s> The starting point of this lecturing-trip around the world was Paris, where we had been living a year or two </s>
<s> We sailed for America, and there made certain preparations </s>
<s> This took but little time </s>
<s> Two members of my family elected to go with me </s>
<s> Also a carbuncle </s>
<s> The dictionary says a carbuncle is a kind of jewel </s>
<s> Humor is out of place in a dictionary </s>
<s> We started westward from New York in midsummer, with Major Pond to manage the platform-business as far as the Pacific </s>
<s> It was warm work, all the way, and the last fortnight of it was suffocatingly smoky, for in Oregon and British Columbia the forest fires were raging </s>
<s> We had an added week of smoke at the seaboard, where we were obliged to wait awhile for our ship </s>
<s> She had been getting herself ashore in the smoke, and she had to be docked And repaired </s>
<s> We sailed at last; and so ended a snail-paced march across the continent, which had lasted forty days </s>
<s> We moved westward about mid-afternoon over a rippled and sparkling summer sea; an enticing sea, a clean and cool sea, and apparently a welcome sea to all on board; it certainly was to me, after the distressful dustings and smokings and swelterings of the past weeks </s>
<s> The voyage would furnish a three-weeks holiday, with hardly a break in it </s>
<s> We had the whole Pacific Ocean in front of us, with nothing to do but do nothing and be comfortable </s>
<s> The city of Victoria was twinkling dim in the deep heart of her smoke-cloud, and getting ready to vanish and now we closed the field-glasses and sat down on our steamer chairs contented and at peace </s>
<s> But they went to wreck and ruin under us and brought us to shame before all the passengers </s>
<s> They had been furnished by the largest furniture-dealing house in Victoria, and were worth a couple of farthings a dozen, though they had cost us the price of honest chairs </s>
<s> In the Pacific and Indian Oceans one must still bring his own deck-chair on board or go without, just as in the old forgotten Atlantic times--those Dark Ages of sea travel </s>
<s> Ours was a reasonably comfortable ship, with the customary sea-going fare --plenty of good food furnished by the Deity and cooked by the devil </s>
<s> The discipline observable on board was perhaps as good as it is anywhere in the Pacific and Indian Oceans </s>
<s> The ship was not very well arranged for tropical service; but that is nothing, for this is the rule for ships which ply in the tropics </s>
<s> She had an over-supply of cockroaches, but this is also the rule with ships doing business in the summer seas--at least such as have been long in service </s>
<s> Our young captain was a very handsome man, tall and perfectly formed, the very figure to show up a smart uniform's finest effects </s>
<s> He was a man of the best intentions and was polite and courteous even to courtliness </s>
<s> There was a soft grace and finish about his manners which made whatever place he happened to be in seem for the moment a drawing room </s>
<s> He avoided the smoking room </s>
<s> He had no vices </s>
<s> He did not smoke or chew tobacco or take snuff; he did not swear, or use slang or rude, or coarse, or indelicate language, or make puns, or tell anecdotes, or laugh intemperately, or raise his voice above the moderate pitch enjoined by the canons of good form </s>
<s> When he gave an order, his manner modified it into a request </s>
<s> After dinner he and his officers joined the ladies and gentlemen in the ladies' saloon, and shared in the singing and piano playing, and helped turn the music </s>
<s> He had a sweet and sympathetic tenor voice, and used it with taste and effect </s>
<s> After the music he played whist there, always with the same partner and opponents, until the ladies' bedtime </s>
<s> The electric lights burned there as late as the ladies and their friends might desire; but they were not allowed to burn in the smoking-room after eleven </s>
<s> There were many laws on the ship's statute book of course; but so far as I could see, this and one other were the only ones that were rigidly enforced </s>
<s> The captain explained that he enforced this one because his own cabin adjoined the smoking-room, and the smell of tobacco smoke made him sick </s>
<s> I did not see how our smoke could reach him, for the smoking-room and his cabin were on the upper deck, targets for all the winds that blew; and besides there was no crack of communication between them, no opening of any sort in the solid intervening bulkhead </s>
<s> Still, to a delicate stomach even imaginary smoke can convey damage </s>
<s> The captain, with his gentle nature, his polish, his sweetness, his moral and verbal purity, seemed pathetically out of place in his rude and autocratic vocation </s>
<s> It seemed another instance of the irony of fate </s>
<s> He was going home under a cloud </s>
<s> The passengers knew about his trouble, and were sorry for him </s>
<s> Approaching Vancouver through a narrow and difficult passage densely befogged with smoke from the forest fires, he had had the ill-luck to lose his bearings and get his ship on the rocks </s>
<s> A matter like this would rank merely as an error with you and me; it ranks as a crime with the directors of steamship companies </s>
<s> The captain had been tried by the Admiralty Court at Vancouver, and its verdict had acquitted him of blame </s>
<s> But that was insufficient comfort </s>
<s> A sterner court would examine the case in Sydney--the Court of Directors, the lords of a company in whose ships the captain had served as mate a number of years </s>
<s> This was his first voyage as captain </s>
<s> The officers of our ship were hearty and companionable young men, and they entered into the general amusements and helped the passengers pass the time </s>
<s> Voyages in the Pacific and Indian Oceans are but pleasure excursions for all hands </s>
<s> Our purser was a young Scotchman who was equipped with a grit that was remarkable </s>
<s> He was an invalid, and looked it, as far as his body was concerned, but illness could not subdue his spirit </s>
<s> He was full of life, and had a gay and capable tongue </s>

<s> She stepped to the buggy and put out her hand to take it---- That was the end of the tale </s>
<s> The passenger who told it said that when he read the story twenty-five years ago in a train he was interrupted at that point--the train jumped off a bridge </s>
<s> At first we thought we could finish the story quite easily, and we set to work with confidence; but it soon began to appear that it was not a simple thing, but difficult and baffling </s>
<s> This was on account of Brown's character--great generosity and kindliness, but complicated with unusual shyness and diffidence, particularly in the presence of ladies </s>

<s> It is the reader's privilege to determine for himself how the thing came out </s>
<s> CHAPTER III </s>
<s> It is more trouble to make a maxim than it is to do right </s>
<s> --Pudd'nhead Wilson's New Calendar </s>
<s> On the seventh day out we saw a dim vast bulk standing up out of the wastes of the Pacific and knew that that spectral promontory was Diamond Head, a piece of this world which I had not seen before for twenty-nine years </s>
<s> So we were nearing Honolulu, the capital city of the Sandwich Islands--those islands which to me were Paradise; a Paradise which I had been longing all those years to see again </s>
<s> Not any other thing in the world could have stirred me as the sight of that great rock did </s>
<s> In the night we anchored a mile from shore </s>
<s> Through my port I could see the twinkling lights of Honolulu and the dark bulk of the mountain-range that stretched away right and left </s>
<s> I could not make out the beautiful Nuuana valley, but I knew where it lay, and remembered how it used to look in the old times </s>
<s> We used to ride up it on horseback in those days --we young people--and branch off and gather bones in a sandy region where one of the first Kamehameha's battles was fought </s>
<s> He was a remarkable man, for a king; and he was also a remarkable man for a savage </s>
<s> He was a mere kinglet and of little or no consequence at the time of Captain Cook's arrival in 1788; but about four years afterward he conceived the idea of enlarging his sphere of influence </s>
<s> That is a courteous modern phrase which means robbing your neighbor--for your neighbor's benefit; and the great theater of its benevolences is Africa </s>
<s> Kamehameha went to war, and in the course of ten years he whipped out all the other kings and made himself master of every one of the nine or ten islands that form the group </s>
<s> But he did more than that </s>
<s> He bought ships, freighted them with sandal wood and other native products, and sent them as far as South America and China; he sold to his savages the foreign stuffs and tools and utensils which came back in these ships, and started the march of civilization </s>
<s> It is doubtful if the match to this extraordinary thing is to be found in the history of any other savage </s>
<s> Savages are eager to learn from the white man any new way to kill each other, but it is not their habit to seize with avidity and apply with energy the larger and nobler ideas which he offers them </s>
<s> The details of Kamehameha's history show that he was always hospitably ready to examine the white man's ideas, and that he exercised a tidy discrimination in making his selections from the samples placed on view </s>
<s> A shrewder discrimination than was exhibited by his son and successor, Liholiho, I think </s>
<s> Liholiho could have qualified as a reformer, perhaps, but as a king he was a mistake </s>
<s> A mistake because he tried to be both king and reformer </s>
<s> This is mixing fire and gunpowder together </s>
<s> A king has no proper business with reforming </s>
<s> His best policy is to keep things as they are; and if he can't do that, he ought to try to make them worse than they are </s>
<s> This is not guesswork; I have thought over this matter a good deal, so that if I should ever have a chance to become a king I would know how to conduct the business in the best way </s>
<s> When Liholiho succeeded his father he found himself possessed of an equipment of royal tools and safeguards which a wiser king would have known how to husband, and judiciously employ, and make profitable </s>
<s> The entire country was under the one scepter, and his was that scepter </s>
<s> There was an Established Church, and he was the head of it </s>
<s> There was a Standing Army, and he was the head of that; an Army of 114 privates under command of 27 Generals and a Field Marshal </s>
<s> There was a proud and ancient Hereditary Nobility </s>
<s> There was still one other asset </s>
<s> This was the tabu--an agent endowed with a mysterious and stupendous power, an agent not found among the properties of any European monarch, a tool of inestimable value in the business </s>
<s> Liholiho was headmaster of the tabu </s>
<s> The tabu was the most ingenious and effective of all the inventions that has ever been devised for keeping a people's privileges satisfactorily restricted </s>
<s> It required the sexes to live in separate houses </s>
<s> It did not allow people to eat in either house; they must eat in another place </s>
<s> It did not allow a man's woman-folk to enter his house </s>
<s> It did not allow the sexes to eat together; the men must eat first, and the women must wait on them </s>
<s> Then the women could eat what was left--if anything was left--and wait on themselves </s>
<s> I mean, if anything of a coarse or unpalatable sort was left, the women could have it </s>
<s> But not the good things, the fine things, the choice things, such as pork, poultry, bananas, cocoanuts, the choicer varieties of fish, and so on </s>
<s> By the tabu, all these were sacred to the men; the women spent their lives longing for them and wondering what they might taste like; and they died without finding out </s>
<s> These rules, as you see, were quite simple and clear </s>
<s> It was easy to remember them; and useful </s>
<s> For the penalty for infringing any rule in the whole list was death </s>
<s> Those women easily learned to put up with shark and taro and dog for a diet when the other things were so expensive </s>
<s> It was death for any one to walk upon tabu'd ground; or defile a tabu'd thing with his touch; or fail in due servility to a chief; or step upon the king's shadow </s>
<s> The nobles and the King and the priests were always suspending little rags here and there and yonder, to give notice to the people that the decorated spot or thing was tabu, and death lurking near </s>
<s> The struggle for life was difficult and chancy in the islands in those days </s>
<s> Thus advantageously was the new king situated </s>
<s> Will it be believed that the first thing he did was to destroy his Established Church, root and branch </s>
<s> He did indeed do that </s>
<s> To state the case figuratively, he was a prosperous sailor who burnt his ship and took to a raft </s>
<s> This Church was a horrid thing </s>
<s> It heavily oppressed the people; it kept them always trembling in the gloom of mysterious threatenings; it slaughtered them in sacrifice before its grotesque idols of wood and stone; it cowed them, it terrorized them, it made them slaves to its priests, and through the priests to the king </s>
<s> It was the best friend a king could have, and the most dependable </s>
<s> To a professional reformer who should annihilate so frightful and so devastating a power as this Church, reverence and praise would be due; but to a king who should do it, could properly be due nothing but reproach; reproach softened by sorrow; sorrow for his unfitness for his position </s>
<s> He destroyed his Established Church, and his kingdom is a republic today, in consequence of that act </s>
<s> When he destroyed the Church and burned the idols he did a mighty thing for civilization and for his people's weal--but it was not "business" </s>
<s> It was unkingly, it was inartistic </s>
<s> It made trouble for his line </s>
<s> The American missionaries arrived while the burned idols were still smoking </s>
<s> They found the nation without a religion, and they repaired the defect </s>
<s> They offered their own religion and it was gladly received </s>
<s> But it was no support to arbitrary kingship, and so the kingly power began to weaken from that day </s>
<s> Forty-seven years later, when I was in the islands, Kamehameha V </s>
<s> was trying to repair Liholiho's blunder, and not succeeding </s>
<s> He had set up an Established Church and made himself the head of it </s>
<s> But it was only a pinchbeck thing, an imitation, a bauble, an empty show </s>
<s> It had no power, no value for a king </s>
<s> It could not harry or burn or slay, it in no way resembled the admirable machine which Liholiho destroyed </s>
<s> It was an Established Church without an Establishment; all the people were Dissenters </s>
<s> Long before that, the kingship had itself become but a name, a show </s>
<s> At an early day the missionaries had turned it into something very much like a republic; and here lately the business whites have turned it into something exactly like it </s>
<s> In Captain Cook's time (1778), the native population of the islands was estimated at 400,000; in 1836 at something short of 200,000, in 1866 at 50,000; it is to-day, per census, 25,000 </s>
<s> All intelligent people praise Kamehameha I </s>
<s> and Liholiho for conferring upon their people the great boon of civilization </s>
<s> I would do it myself, but my intelligence is out of repair, now, from over-work </s>
<s> When I was in the islands nearly a generation ago, I was acquainted with a young American couple who had among their belongings an attractive little son of the age of seven--attractive but not practicably companionable with me, because he knew no English </s>
<s> He had played from his birth with the little Kanakas on his father's plantation, and had preferred their language and would learn no other </s>
<s> The family removed to America a month after I arrived in the islands, and straightway the boy began to lose his Kanaka and pick up English </s>
<s> By the time he was twelve he hadn't a word of Kanaka left; the language had wholly departed from his tongue and from his comprehension </s>
<s> Nine years later, when he was twenty-one, I came upon the family in one of the lake towns of New York, and the mother told me about an adventure which her son had been having </s>
<s> By trade he was now a professional diver </s>
<s> A passenger boat had been caught in a storm on the lake, and had gone down, carrying her people with her </s>
<s> A few days later the young diver descended, with his armor on, and entered the berth-saloon of the boat, and stood at the foot of the companionway, with his hand on the rail, peering through the dim water </s>
<s> Presently something touched him on the shoulder, and he turned and found a dead man swaying and bobbing about him and seemingly inspecting him inquiringly </s>
<s> He was paralyzed with fright </s>
<s> His entry had disturbed the water, and now he discerned a number of dim corpses making for him and wagging their heads and swaying their bodies like sleepy people trying to dance </s>
<s> His senses forsook him, and in that condition he was drawn to the surface </s>
<s> He was put to bed at home, and was soon very ill </s>
<s> During some days he had seasons of delirium which lasted several hours at a time; and while they lasted he talked Kanaka incessantly and glibly; and Kanaka only </s>
<s> He was still very ill, and he talked to me in that tongue; but I did not understand it, of course </s>
<s> The doctor-books tell us that cases like this are not uncommon </s>
<s> Then the doctors ought to study the cases and find out how to multiply them </s>
<s> Many languages and things get mislaid in a person's head, and stay mislaid for lack of this remedy </s>
<s> Many memories of my former visit to the islands came up in my mind while we lay at anchor in front of Honolulu that night </s>
<s> And pictures--pictures pictures--an enchanting procession of them </s>
<s> I was impatient for the morning to come </s>

<s> My lecture-hall was ready, but I was not to see that, either </s>
<s> Several of our passengers belonged in Honolulu, and these were sent ashore; but nobody could go ashore and return </s>
<s> There were people on shore who were booked to go with us to Australia, but we could not receive them; to do it would cost us a quarantine-term in Sydney </s>
<s> They could have escaped the day before, by ship to San Francisco; but the bars had been put up, now, and they might have to wait weeks before any ship could venture to give them a passage any whither </s>
<s> And there were hardships for others </s>
<s> An elderly lady and her son, recreation-seekers from Massachusetts, had wandered westward, further and further from home, always intending to take the return track, but always concluding to go still a little further; and now here they were at anchor before Honolulu positively their last westward-bound indulgence--they had made up their minds to that--but where is the use in making up your mind in this world </s>
<s> It is usually a waste of time to do it </s>
<s> These two would have to stay with us as far as Australia </s>
<s> Then they could go on around the world, or go back the way they had come; the distance and the accommodations and outlay of time would be just the same, whichever of the two routes they might elect to take </s>
<s> Think of it: a projected excursion of five hundred miles gradually enlarged, without any elaborate degree of intention, to a possible twenty-four thousand </s>
<s> However, they were used to extensions by this time, and did not mind this new one much </s>
<s> And we had with us a lawyer from Victoria, who had been sent out by the Government on an international matter, and he had brought his wife with him and left the children at home with the servants and now what was to be done </s>

<s> Most certainly not </s>
<s> They decided to go on, to the Fiji islands, wait there a fortnight for the next ship, and then sail for home </s>
<s> They couldn't foresee that they wouldn't see a homeward-bound ship again for six weeks, and that no word could come to them from the children, and no word go from them to the children in all that time </s>
<s> It is easy to make plans in this world; even a cat can do it; and when one is out in those remote oceans it is noticeable that a cat's plans and a man's are worth about the same </s>
<s> There is much the same shrinkage in both, in the matter of values </s>
<s> There was nothing for us to do but sit about the decks in the shade of the awnings and look at the distant shore </s>
<s> We lay in luminous blue water; shoreward the water was green-green and brilliant; at the shore itself it broke in a long white ruffle, and with no crash, no sound that we could hear </s>
<s> The town was buried under a mat of foliage that looked like a cushion of moss </s>
<s> The silky mountains were clothed in soft, rich splendors of melting color, and some of the cliffs were veiled in slanting mists </s>
<s> I recognized it all </s>
<s> It was just as I had seen it long before, with nothing of its beauty lost, nothing of its charm wanting </s>
<s> A change had come, but that was political, and not visible from the ship </s>
<s> The monarchy of my day was gone, and a republic was sitting in its seat </s>
<s> It was not a material change </s>
<s> The old imitation pomps, the fuss and feathers, have departed, and the royal trademark--that is about all that one could miss, I suppose </s>
<s> That imitation monarchy, was grotesque enough, in my time; if it had held on another thirty years it would have been a monarchy without subjects of the king's race </s>
<s> We had a sunset of a very fine sort </s>
<s> The vast plain of the sea was marked off in bands of sharply-contrasted colors: great stretches of dark blue, others of purple, others of polished bronze; the billowy mountains showed all sorts of dainty browns and greens, blues and purples and blacks, and the rounded velvety backs of certain of them made one want to stroke them, as one would the sleek back of a cat </s>
<s> The long, sloping promontory projecting into the sea at the west turned dim and leaden and spectral, then became suffused with pink--dissolved itself in a pink dream, so to speak, it seemed so airy and unreal </s>
<s> Presently the cloud-rack was flooded with fiery splendors, and these were copied on the surface of the sea, and it made one drunk with delight to look upon it </s>
<s> From talks with certain of our passengers whose home was Honolulu, and from a sketch by Mrs Mary H </s>
<s> Krout, I was able to perceive what the Honolulu of to-day is, as compared with the Honolulu of my time </s>
<s> In my time it was a beautiful little town, made up of snow-white wooden cottages deliciously smothered in tropical vines and flowers and trees and shrubs; and its coral roads and streets were hard and smooth, and as white as the houses </s>
<s> The outside aspects of the place suggested the presence of a modest and comfortable prosperity--a general prosperity --perhaps one might strengthen the term and say universal </s>
<s> There were no fine houses, no fine furniture </s>
<s> There were no decorations </s>
<s> Tallow candles furnished the light for the bedrooms, a whale-oil lamp furnished it for the parlor </s>
<s> Native matting served as carpeting </s>
<s> In the parlor one would find two or three lithographs on the walls--portraits as a rule: Kamehameha IV., Louis Kossuth, Jenny Lind; and may be an engraving or two: Rebecca at the Well, Moses smiting the rock, Joseph's servants finding the cup in Benjamin's sack </s>
<s> There would be a center table, with books of a tranquil sort on it: The Whole Duty of Man, Baxter's Saints' Rest, Fox's Martyrs, Tupper's Proverbial Philosophy, bound copies of The Missionary Herald and of Father Damon's Seaman's Friend </s>
<s> A melodeon; a music stand, with 'Willie, We have Missed You', 'Star of the Evening', 'Roll on Silver Moon', 'Are We Most There', 'I Would not Live Alway', and other songs of love and sentiment, together with an assortment of hymns </s>
<s> A what-not with semi-globular glass paperweights, enclosing miniature pictures of ships, New England rural snowstorms, and the like; sea-shells with Bible texts carved on them in cameo style; native curios; whale's tooth with full-rigged ship carved on it </s>
<s> There was nothing reminiscent of foreign parts, for nobody had been abroad </s>
<s> Trips were made to San Francisco, but that could not be called going abroad </s>
<s> Comprehensively speaking, nobody traveled </s>
<s> But Honolulu has grown wealthy since then, and of course wealth has introduced changes; some of the old simplicities have disappeared </s>
<s> Here is a modern house, as pictured by Mrs Krout: "Almost every house is surrounded by extensive lawns and gardens enclosed by walls of volcanic stone or by thick hedges of the brilliant hibiscus </s>
<s> "The houses are most tastefully and comfortably furnished; the floors are either of hard wood covered with rugs or with fine Indian matting, while there is a preference, as in most warm countries, for rattan or bamboo furniture; there are the usual accessories of bric-a-brac, pictures, books, and curios from all parts of the world, for these island dwellers are indefatigable travelers </s>
<s> "Nearly every house has what is called a lanai </s>
<s> It is a large apartment, roofed, floored, open on three sides, with a door or a draped archway opening into the drawing-room </s>
<s> Frequently the roof is formed by the thick interlacing boughs of the hou tree, impervious to the sun and even to the rain, except in violent storms </s>
<s> Vines are trained about the sides--the stephanotis or some one of the countless fragrant and blossoming trailers which abound in the islands </s>
<s> There are also curtains of matting that may be drawn to exclude the sun or rain </s>
<s> The floor is bare for coolness, or partially covered with rugs, and the lanai is prettily furnished with comfortable chairs, sofas, and tables loaded with flowers, or wonderful ferns in pots </s>
<s> "The lanai is the favorite reception room, and here at any social function the musical program is given and cakes and ices are served; here morning callers are received, or gay riding parties, the ladies in pretty divided skirts, worn for convenience in riding astride, --the universal mode adopted by Europeans and Americans, as well as by the natives </s>
<s> "The comfort and luxury of such an apartment, especially at a seashore villa, can hardly be imagined </s>
<s> The soft breezes sweep across it, heavy with the fragrance of jasmine and gardenia, and through the swaying boughs of palm and mimosa there are glimpses of rugged mountains, their summits veiled in clouds, of purple sea with the white surf beating eternally against the reefs, whiter still in the yellow sunlight or the magical moonlight of the tropics" </s>
<s> There: rugs, ices, pictures, lanais, worldly books, sinful bric-a-brac fetched from everywhere </s>
<s> And the ladies riding astride </s>
<s> These are changes, indeed </s>
<s> In my time the native women rode astride, but the white ones lacked the courage to adopt their wise custom </s>
<s> In my time ice was seldom seen in Honolulu </s>
<s> It sometimes came in sailing vessels from New England as ballast; and then, if there happened to be a man-of-war in port and balls and suppers raging by consequence, the ballast was worth six hundred dollars a ton, as is evidenced by reputable tradition </s>
<s> But the ice-machine has traveled all over the world, now, and brought ice within everybody's reach </s>
<s> In Lapland and Spitzbergen no one uses native ice in our day, except the bears and the walruses </s>
<s> The bicycle is not mentioned </s>
<s> It was not necessary </s>
<s> We know that it is there, without inquiring </s>
<s> It is everywhere </s>
<s> But for it, people could never have had summer homes on the summit of Mont Blanc; before its day, property up there had but a nominal value </s>
<s> The ladies of the Hawaiian capital learned too late the right way to occupy a horse--too late to get much benefit from it </s>
<s> The riding-horse is retiring from business everywhere in the world </s>
<s> In Honolulu a few years from now he will be only a tradition </s>
<s> We all know about Father Damien, the French priest who voluntarily forsook the world and went to the leper island of Molokai to labor among its population of sorrowful exiles who wait there, in slow-consuming misery, for death to come and release them from their troubles; and we know that the thing which he knew beforehand would happen, did happen: that he became a leper himself, and died of that horrible disease </s>
<s> There was still another case of self-sacrifice, it appears </s>
<s> I asked after "Billy" Ragsdale, interpreter to the Parliament in my time--a half-white </s>
<s> He was a brilliant young fellow, and very popular </s>
<s> As an interpreter he would have been hard to match anywhere </s>
<s> He used to stand up in the Parliament and turn the English speeches into Hawaiian and the Hawaiian speeches into English with a readiness and a volubility that were astonishing </s>
<s> I asked after him, and was told that his prosperous career was cut short in a sudden and unexpected way, just as he was about to marry a beautiful half-caste girl </s>
<s> He discovered, by some nearly invisible sign about his skin, that the poison of leprosy was in him </s>
<s> The secret was his own, and might be kept concealed for years; but he would not be treacherous to the girl that loved him; he would not marry her to a doom like his </s>
<s> And so he put his affairs in order, and went around to all his friends and bade them good-bye, and sailed in the leper ship to Molokai </s>
<s> There he died the loathsome and lingering death that all lepers die </s>
<s> In this place let me insert a paragraph or two from "The Paradise of the Pacific" (Rev </s>

<s> H </s>
<s> Gowen)-- "Poor lepers </s>
<s> It is easy for those who have no relatives or friends among them to enforce the decree of segregation to the letter, but who can write of the terrible, the heart-breaking scenes which that enforcement has brought about </s>
<s> "A man upon Hawaii was suddenly taken away after a summary arrest, leaving behind him a helpless wife about to give birth to a babe </s>
<s> The devoted wife with great pain and risk came the whole journey to Honolulu, and pleaded until the authorities were unable to resist her entreaty that she might go and live like a leper with her leper husband </s>
<s> "A woman in the prime of life and activity is condemned as an incipient leper, suddenly removed from her home, and her husband returns to find his two helpless babes moaning for their lost mother </s>
<s> "Imagine it </s>
<s> The case of the babies is hard, but its bitterness is a trifle--less than a trifle--less than nothing--compared to what the mother must suffer; and suffer minute by minute, hour by hour, day by day, month by month, year by year, without respite, relief, or any abatement of her pain till she dies </s>
<s> "One woman, Luka Kaaukau, has been living with her leper husband in the settlement for twelve years </s>
<s> The man has scarcely a joint left, his limbs are only distorted ulcerated stumps, for four years his wife has put every particle of food into his mouth </s>
<s> He wanted his wife to abandon his wretched carcass long ago, as she herself was sound and well, but Luka said that she was content to remain and wait on the man she loved till the spirit should be freed from its burden </s>
<s> "I myself have known hard cases enough:--of a girl, apparently in full health, decorating the church with me at Easter, who before Christmas is taken away as a confirmed leper; of a mother hiding her child in the mountains for years so that not even her dearest friends knew that she had a child alive, that he might not be taken away; of a respectable white man taken away from his wife and family, and compelled to become a dweller in the Leper Settlement, where he is counted dead, even by the insurance companies" </s>
<s> And one great pity of it all is, that these poor sufferers are innocent </s>
<s> The leprosy does not come of sins which they committed, but of sins committed by their ancestors, who escaped the curse of leprosy </s>
<s> Mr Gowan has made record of a certain very striking circumstance </s>
<s> Would you expect to find in that awful Leper Settlement a custom worthy to be transplanted to your own country </s>
<s> They have one such, and it is inexpressibly touching and beautiful </s>
<s> When death sets open the prison-door of life there, the band salutes the freed soul with a burst of glad music </s>
<s> CHAPTER IV </s>
<s> A dozen direct censures are easier to bear than one morganatic compliment </s>

<s> Sailed from Honolulu.--From diary: Sept </s>
<s> 2 </s>
<s> Flocks of flying fish-slim, shapely, graceful, and intensely white </s>
<s> With the sun on them they look like a flight of silver fruit-knives </s>
<s> They are able to fly a hundred yards </s>
<s> Sept </s>
<s> 3 </s>
<s> In 9 deg </s>
<s> 50' north latitude, at breakfast </s>
<s> Approaching the equator on a long slant </s>
<s> Those of us who have never seen the equator are a good deal excited </s>
<s> I think I would rather see it than any other thing in the world </s>
<s> We entered the "doldrums" last night--variable winds, bursts of rain, intervals of calm, with chopping seas and a wobbly and drunken motion to the ship--a condition of things findable in other regions sometimes, but present in the doldrums always </s>
<s> The globe-girdling belt called the doldrums is 20 degrees wide, and the thread called the equator lies along the middle of it </s>
<s> Sept </s>
<s> 4 </s>
<s> Total eclipse of the moon last night </s>
<s> At 7.30 it began to go off </s>
<s> At total--or about that--it was like a rich rosy cloud with a tumbled surface framed in the circle and projecting from it--a bulge of strawberry-ice, so to speak </s>
<s> At half-eclipse the moon was like a gilded acorn in its cup </s>
<s> Sept </s>
<s> 5 </s>
<s> Closing in on the equator this noon </s>
<s> A sailor explained to a young girl that the ship's speed is poor because we are climbing up the bulge toward the center of the globe; but that when we should once get over, at the equator, and start down-hill, we should fly </s>
<s> When she asked him the other day what the fore-yard was, he said it was the front yard, the open area in the front end of the ship </s>
<s> That man has a good deal of learning stored up, and the girl is likely to get it all </s>
<s> Afternoon </s>
<s> Crossed the equator </s>
<s> In the distance it looked like a blue ribbon stretched across the ocean </s>
<s> Several passengers kodak'd it </s>
<s> We had no fool ceremonies, no fantastics, no horse play </s>
<s> All that sort of thing has gone out </s>
<s> In old times a sailor, dressed as Neptune, used to come in over the bows, with his suite, and lather up and shave everybody who was crossing the equator for the first time, and then cleanse these unfortunates by swinging them from the yard-arm and ducking them three times in the sea </s>
<s> This was considered funny </s>
<s> Nobody knows why </s>
<s> No, that is not true </s>
<s> We do know why </s>
<s> Such a thing could never be funny on land; no part of the old-time grotesque performances gotten up on shipboard to celebrate the passage of the line could ever be funny on shore--they would seem dreary and witless to shore people </s>
<s> But the shore people would change their minds about it at sea, on a long voyage </s>
<s> On such a voyage, with its eternal monotonies, people's intellects deteriorate; the owners of the intellects soon reach a point where they almost seem to prefer childish things to things of a maturer degree </s>
<s> One is often surprised at the juvenilities which grown people indulge in at sea, and the interest they take in them, and the consuming enjoyment they get out of them </s>
<s> This is on long voyages only </s>
<s> The mind gradually becomes inert, dull, blunted; it loses its accustomed interest in intellectual things; nothing but horse-play can rouse it, nothing but wild and foolish grotesqueries can entertain it </s>
<s> On short voyages it makes no such exposure of itself; it hasn't time to slump down to this sorrowful level </s>
<s> The short-voyage passenger gets his chief physical exercise out of "horse-billiards"--shovel-board </s>
<s> It is a good game </s>
<s> We play it in this ship </s>
<s> A quartermaster chalks off a diagram like this-on the deck </s>
<s> The player uses a cue that is like a broom-handle with a quarter-moon of wood fastened to the end of it </s>
<s> With this he shoves wooden disks the size of a saucer--he gives the disk a vigorous shove and sends it fifteen or twenty feet along the deck and lands it in one of the squares if he can </s>
<s> If it stays there till the inning is played out, it will count as many points in the game as the figure in the square it has stopped in represents </s>
<s> The adversary plays to knock that disk out and leave his own in its place--particularly if it rests upon the 9 or 10 or some other of the high numbers; but if it rests in the "10off" he backs it up--lands his disk behind it a foot or two, to make it difficult for its owner to knock it out of that damaging place and improve his record </s>
<s> When the inning is played out it may be found that each adversary has placed his four disks where they count; it may be found that some of them are touching chalk lines and not counting; and very often it will be found that there has been a general wreckage, and that not a disk has been left within the diagram </s>
<s> Anyway, the result is recorded, whatever it is, and the game goes on </s>
<s> The game is 100 points, and it takes from twenty minutes to forty to play it, according to luck and the condition of the sea </s>
<s> It is an exciting game, and the crowd of spectators furnish abundance of applause for fortunate shots and plenty of laughter for the other kind </s>
<s> It is a game of skill, but at the same time the uneasy motion of the ship is constantly interfering with skill; this makes it a chancy game, and the element of luck comes largely in </s>
<s> We had a couple of grand tournaments, to determine who should be "Champion of the Pacific"; they included among the participants nearly all the passengers, of both sexes, and the officers of the ship, and they afforded many days of stupendous interest and excitement, and murderous exercise--for horse-billiards is a physically violent game </s>
<s> The figures in the following record of some of the closing games in the first tournament will show, better than any description, how very chancy the game is </s>
<s> The losers here represented had all been winners in the previous games of the series, some of them by fine majorities: Chase,102 Mrs D.,57 Mortimer, 105 The Surgeon, 92 Miss C.,105 Mrs T.,9 Clemens, 101 Taylor,92 Taylor,109 Davies,95 Miss C., 108 Mortimer,55 Thomas,102 Roper,76 Clemens, 111 Miss C.,89 Coomber, 106 Chase,98 And so on; until but three couples of winners were left </s>
<s> Then I beat my man, young Smith beat his man, and Thomas beat his </s>
<s> This reduced the combatants to three </s>
<s> Smith and I took the deck, and I led off </s>
<s> At the close of the first inning I was 10 worse than nothing and Smith had scored 7 </s>
<s> The luck continued against me </s>
<s> When I was 57, Smith was 97 --within 3 of out </s>
<s> The luck changed then </s>
<s> He picked up a 10-off or so, and couldn't recover </s>
<s> I beat him </s>
<s> The next game would end tournament No </s>
<s> 1 </s>
<s> Mr Thomas and I were the contestants </s>
<s> He won the lead and went to the bat--so to speak </s>
<s> And there he stood, with the crotch of his cue resting against his disk while the ship rose slowly up, sank slowly down, rose again, sank again </s>
<s> She never seemed to rise to suit him exactly </s>
<s> She started up once more; and when she was nearly ready for the turn, he let drive and landed his disk just within the left-hand end of the 10 </s>
<s> (Applause) </s>
<s> The umpire proclaimed "a good 10," and the game-keeper set it down </s>
<s> I played: my disk grazed the edge of Mr Thomas's disk, and went out of the diagram </s>
<s> (No applause.) Mr Thomas played again--and landed his second disk alongside of the first, and almost touching its right-hand side </s>
<s> "Good 10" </s>
<s> (Great applause.) I played, and missed both of them </s>
<s> (No applause.) Mr Thomas delivered his third shot and landed his disk just at the right of the other two </s>
<s> "Good 10" </s>
<s> (Immense applause.) There they lay, side by side, the three in a row </s>
<s> It did not seem possible that anybody could miss them </s>
<s> Still I did it </s>
<s> (Immense silence.) Mr Thomas played his last disk </s>
<s> It seems incredible, but he actually landed that disk alongside of the others, and just to the right of them-a straight solid row of 4 disks </s>
<s> (Tumultuous and long-continued applause.) Then I played my last disk </s>
<s> Again it did not seem possible that anybody could miss that row--a row which would have been 14 inches long if the disks had been clamped together; whereas, with the spaces separating them they made a longer row than that </s>
<s> But I did it </s>
<s> It may be that I was getting nervous </s>
<s> I think it unlikely that that innings has ever had its parallel in the history of horse-billiards </s>
<s> To place the four disks side by side in the 10 was an extraordinary feat; indeed, it was a kind of miracle </s>
<s> To miss them was another miracle </s>
<s> It will take a century to produce another man who can place the four disks in the 10; and longer than that to find a man who can't knock them out </s>
<s> I was ashamed of my performance at the time, but now that I reflect upon it I see that it was rather fine and difficult </s>
<s> Mr Thomas kept his luck, and won the game, and later the championship </s>
<s> In a minor tournament I won the prize, which was a Waterbury watch </s>
<s> I put it in my trunk </s>
<s> In Pretoria, South Africa, nine months afterward, my proper watch broke down and I took the Waterbury out, wound it, set it by the great clock on the Parliament House (8.05), then went back to my room and went to bed, tired from a long railway journey </s>
<s> The parliamentary clock had a peculiarity which I was not aware of at the time --a peculiarity which exists in no other clock, and would not exist in that one if it had been made by a sane person; on the half-hour it strikes the succeeding hour, then strikes the hour again, at the proper time </s>
<s> I lay reading and smoking awhile; then, when I could hold my eyes open no longer and was about to put out the light, the great clock began to boom, and I counted ten </s>
<s> I reached for the Waterbury to see how it was getting along </s>
<s> It was marking 9.30 </s>
<s> It seemed rather poor speed for a three-dollar watch, but I supposed that the climate was affecting it </s>
<s> I shoved it half an hour ahead; and took to my book and waited to see what would happen </s>
<s> At 10 the great clock struck ten again </s>
<s> I looked--the Waterbury was marking half-past 10 </s>
<s> This was too much speed for the money, and it troubled me </s>
<s> I pushed the hands back a half hour, and waited once more; I had to, for I was vexed and restless now, and my sleepiness was gone </s>
<s> By and by the great clock struck 11 </s>
<s> The Waterbury was marking 10.30 </s>
<s> I pushed it ahead half an hour, with some show of temper </s>
<s> By and by the great clock struck 11 again </s>
<s> The Waterbury showed up 11.30, now, and I beat her brains out against the bedstead </s>
<s> I was sorry next day, when I found out </s>
<s> To return to the ship </s>
<s> The average human being is a perverse creature; and when he isn't that, he is a practical joker </s>
<s> The result to the other person concerned is about the same: that is, he is made to suffer </s>
<s> The washing down of the decks begins at a very early hour in all ships; in but few ships are any measures taken to protect the passengers, either by waking or warning them, or by sending a steward to close their ports </s>
<s> And so the deckwashers have their opportunity, and they use it </s>
<s> They send a bucket of water slashing along the side of the ship and into the ports, drenching the passenger's clothes, and often the passenger himself </s>
<s> This good old custom prevailed in this ship, and under unusually favorable circumstances, for in the blazing tropical regions a removable zinc thing like a sugarshovel projects from the port to catch the wind and bring it in; this thing catches the wash-water and brings it in, too--and in flooding abundance </s>
<s> Mrs I., an invalid, had to sleep on the locker-- sofa under her port, and every time she over-slept and thus failed to take care of herself, the deck-washers drowned her out </s>
<s> And the painters, what a good time they had </s>
<s> This ship would be going into dock for a month in Sydney for repairs; but no matter, painting was going on all the time somewhere or other </s>
<s> The ladies' dresses were constantly getting ruined, nevertheless protests and supplications went for nothing </s>
<s> Sometimes a lady, taking an afternoon nap on deck near a ventilator or some other thing that didn't need painting, would wake up by and by and find that the humorous painter had been noiselessly daubing that thing and had splattered her white gown all over with little greasy yellow spots </s>
<s> The blame for this untimely painting did not lie with the ship's officers, but with custom </s>
<s> As far back as Noah's time it became law that ships must be constantly painted and fussed at when at sea; custom grew out of the law, and at sea custom knows no death; this custom will continue until the sea goes dry </s>
<s> Sept </s>
<s> 8.--Sunday </s>
<s> We are moving so nearly south that we cross only about two meridians of longitude a day </s>
<s> This morning we were in longitude 178 west from Greenwich, and 57 degrees west from San Francisco </s>
<s> To-morrow we shall be close to the center of the globe--the 180th degree of west longitude and 180th degree of east longitude </s>
<s> And then we must drop out a day-lose a day out of our lives, a day never to be found again </s>
<s> We shall all die one day earlier than from the beginning of time we were foreordained to die </s>
<s> We shall be a day behindhand all through eternity </s>
<s> We shall always be saying to the other angels, "Fine day today," and they will be always retorting, "But it isn't to-day, it's tomorrow" </s>
<s> We shall be in a state of confusion all the time and shall never know what true happiness is </s>
<s> Next Day </s>
<s> Sure enough, it has happened </s>
<s> Yesterday it was September 8, Sunday; to-day, per the bulletin-board at the head of the companionway, it is September 10, Tuesday </s>
<s> There is something uncanny about it </s>
<s> And uncomfortable </s>
<s> In fact, nearly unthinkable, and wholly unrealizable, when one comes to consider it </s>
<s> While we were crossing the 180th meridian it was Sunday in the stern of the ship where my family were, and Tuesday in the bow where I was </s>
<s> They were there eating the half of a fresh apple on the 8th, and I was at the same time eating the other half of it on the 10th--and I could notice how stale it was, already </s>
<s> The family were the same age that they were when I had left them five minutes before, but I was a day older now than I was then </s>
<s> The day they were living in stretched behind them half way round the globe, across the Pacific Ocean and America and Europe; the day I was living in stretched in front of me around the other half to meet it </s>
<s> They were stupendous days for bulk and stretch; apparently much larger days than we had ever been in before </s>
<s> All previous days had been but shrunk-up little things by comparison </s>
<s> The difference in temperature between the two days was very marked, their day being hotter than mine because it was closer to the equator </s>
<s> Along about the moment that we were crossing the Great Meridian a child was born in the steerage, and now there is no way to tell which day it was born on </s>
<s> The nurse thinks it was Sunday, the surgeon thinks it was Tuesday </s>
<s> The child will never know its own birthday </s>
<s> It will always be choosing first one and then the other, and will never be able to make up its mind permanently </s>
<s> This will breed vacillation and uncertainty in its opinions about religion, and politics, and business, and sweethearts, and everything, and will undermine its principles, and rot them away, and make the poor thing characterless, and its success in life impossible </s>
<s> Every one in the ship says so </s>
<s> And this is not all--in fact, not the worst </s>
<s> For there is an enormously rich brewer in the ship who said as much as ten days ago, that if the child was born on his birthday he would give it ten thousand dollars to start its little life with </s>
<s> His birthday was Monday, the 9th of September </s>
<s> If the ships all moved in the one direction--westward, I mean--the world would suffer a prodigious loss--in the matter of valuable time, through the dumping overboard on the Great Meridian of such multitudes of days by ships crews and passengers </s>
<s> But fortunately the ships do not all sail west, half of them sail east </s>
<s> So there is no real loss </s>
<s> These latter pick up all the discarded days and add them to the world's stock again; and about as good as new, too; for of course the salt water preserves them </s>
<s> CHAPTER V </s>
<s> Noise proves nothing </s>
<s> Often a hen who has merely laid an egg cackles as if she had laid an asteroid </s>
<s> --Pudd'nhead Wilson's New Calendar </s>
<s> WEDNESDAY, Sept </s>
<s> 11 </s>
<s> In this world we often make mistakes of judgment </s>
<s> We do not as a rule get out of them sound and whole, but sometimes we do </s>
<s> At dinner yesterday evening-present, a mixture of Scotch, English, American, Canadian, and Australasian folk--a discussion broke out about the pronunciation of certain Scottish words </s>
<s> This was private ground, and the non-Scotch nationalities, with one exception, discreetly kept still </s>
<s> But I am not discreet, and I took a hand </s>
<s> I didn't know anything about the subject, but I took a hand just to have something to do </s>
<s> At that moment the word in dispute was the word three </s>
<s> One Scotchman was claiming that the peasantry of Scotland pronounced it three, his adversaries claimed that they didn't--that they pronounced it 'thraw' </s>
<s> The solitary Scot was having a sultry time of it, so I thought I would enrich him with my help </s>
<s> In my position I was necessarily quite impartial, and was equally as well and as ill equipped to fight on the one side as on the other </s>
<s> So I spoke up and said the peasantry pronounced the word three, not thraw </s>
<s> It was an error of judgment </s>
<s> There was a moment of astonished and ominous silence, then weather ensued </s>
<s> The storm rose and spread in a surprising way, and I was snowed under in a very few minutes </s>
<s> It was a bad defeat for me--a kind of Waterloo </s>
<s> It promised to remain so, and I wished I had had better sense than to enter upon such a forlorn enterprise </s>
<s> But just then I had a saving thought--at least a thought that offered a chance </s>
<s> While the storm was still raging, I made up a Scotch couplet, and then spoke up and said: "Very well, don't say any more </s>
<s> I confess defeat </s>
<s> I thought I knew, but I see my mistake </s>
<s> I was deceived by one of your Scotch poets" </s>
<s> "A Scotch poet </s>
<s> O come </s>
<s> Name him" </s>
<s> "Robert Burns" </s>
<s> It is wonderful the power of that name </s>
<s> These men looked doubtful--but paralyzed, all the same </s>
<s> They were quite silent for a moment; then one of them said--with the reverence in his voice which is always present in a Scotchman's tone when he utters the name </s>
<s> "Does Robbie Burns say--what does he say" </s>
<s> "This is what he says: 'There were nae bairns but only three --Ane at the breast, twa at the knee'." It ended the discussion </s>
<s> There was no man there profane enough, disloyal enough, to say any word against a thing which Robert Burns had settled </s>
<s> I shall always honor that great name for the salvation it brought me in this time of my sore need </s>
<s> It is my belief that nearly any invented quotation, played with confidence, stands a good chance to deceive </s>
<s> There are people who think that honesty is always the best policy </s>
<s> This is a superstition; there are times when the appearance of it is worth six of it </s>
<s> We are moving steadily southward-getting further and further down under the projecting paunch of the globe </s>
<s> Yesterday evening we saw the Big Dipper and the north star sink below the horizon and disappear from our world </s>
<s> No, not "we," but they </s>
<s> They saw it--somebody saw it--and told me about it </s>
<s> But it is no matter, I was not caring for those things, I am tired of them, any way </s>
<s> I think they are well enough, but one doesn't want them always hanging around </s>
<s> My interest was all in the Southern Cross </s>
<s> I had never seen that </s>
<s> I had heard about it all my life, and it was but natural that I should be burning to see it </s>
<s> No other constellation makes so much talk </s>
<s> I had nothing against the Big Dipper --and naturally couldn't have anything against it, since it is a citizen of our own sky, and the property of the United States--but I did want it to move out of the way and give this foreigner a chance </s>
<s> Judging by the size of the talk which the Southern Cross had made, I supposed it would need a sky all to itself </s>
<s> But that was a mistake </s>
<s> We saw the Cross to-night, and it is not large </s>
<s> Not large, and not strikingly bright </s>
<s> But it was low down toward the horizon, and it may improve when it gets up higher in the sky </s>
<s> It is ingeniously named, for it looks just as a cross would look if it looked like something else </s>
<s> But that description does not describe; it is too vague, too general, too indefinite </s>
<s> It does after a fashion suggest a cross -- a cross that is out of repair--or out of drawing; not correctly shaped </s>
<s> It is long, with a short cross-bar, and the cross-bar is canted out of the straight line </s>
<s> It consists of four large stars and one little one </s>
<s> The little one is out of line and further damages the shape </s>
<s> It should have been placed at the intersection of the stem and the cross-bar </s>
<s> If you do not draw an imaginary line from star to star it does not suggest a cross--nor anything in particular </s>
<s> One must ignore the little star, and leave it out of the combination--it confuses everything </s>
<s> If you leave it out, then you can make out of the four stars a sort of cross--out of true; or a sort of kite--out of true; or a sort of coffin-out of true </s>
<s> Constellations have always been troublesome things to name </s>
<s> If you give one of them a fanciful name, it will always refuse to live up to it; it will always persist in not resembling the thing it has been named for </s>
<s> Ultimately, to satisfy the public, the fanciful name has to be discarded for a common-sense one, a manifestly descriptive one </s>
<s> The Great Bear remained the Great Bear--and unrecognizable as such--for thousands of years; and people complained about it all the time, and quite properly; but as soon as it became the property of the United States, Congress changed it to the Big Dipper, and now every body is satisfied, and there is no more talk about riots </s>
<s> I would not change the Southern Cross to the Southern Coffin, I would change it to the Southern Kite; for up there in the general emptiness is the proper home of a kite, but not for coffins and crosses and dippers </s>
<s> In a little while, now--I cannot tell exactly how long it will be--the globe will belong to the English-speaking race; and of course the skies also </s>
<s> Then the constellations will be re-organized, and polished up, and re-named--the most of them "Victoria," I reckon, but this one will sail thereafter as the Southern Kite, or go out of business </s>
<s> Several towns and things, here and there, have been named for Her Majesty already </s>
<s> In these past few days we are plowing through a mighty Milky Way of islands </s>
<s> They are so thick on the map that one would hardly expect to find room between them for a canoe; yet we seldom glimpse one </s>
<s> Once we saw the dim bulk of a couple of them, far away, spectral and dreamy things; members of the Horne-Alofa and Fortuna </s>
<s> On the larger one are two rival native kings--and they have a time together </s>
<s> They are Catholics; so are their people </s>
<s> The missionaries there are French priests </s>
<s> From the multitudinous islands in these regions the "recruits" for the Queensland plantations were formerly drawn; are still drawn from them, I believe </s>
<s> Vessels fitted up like old-time slavers came here and carried off the natives to serve as laborers in the great Australian province </s>
<s> In the beginning it was plain, simple man-stealing, as per testimony of the missionaries </s>
<s> This has been denied, but not disproven </s>
<s> Afterward it was forbidden by law to "recruit" a native without his consent, and governmental agents were sent in all recruiting vessels to see that the law was obeyed--which they did, according to the recruiting people; and which they sometimes didn't, according to the missionaries </s>
<s> A man could be lawfully recruited for a three-years term of service; he could volunteer for another term if he so chose; when his time was up he could return to his island </s>
<s> And would also have the means to do it; for the government required the employer to put money in its hands for this purpose before the recruit was delivered to him </s>
<s> Captain Wawn was a recruiting ship-master during many years </s>
<s> From his pleasant book one gets the idea that the recruiting business was quite popular with the islanders, as a rule </s>
<s> And yet that did not make the business wholly dull and uninteresting; for one finds rather frequent little breaks in the monotony of it--like this, for instance: "The afternoon of our arrival at Leper Island the schooner was lying almost becalmed under the lee of the lofty central portion of the island, about three-quarters of a mile from the shore </s>
<s> The boats were in sight at some distance </s>
<s> The recruiter-boat had run into a small nook on the rocky coast, under a high bank, above which stood a solitary hut backed by dense forest </s>
<s> The government agent and mate in the second boat lay about 400 yards to the westward </s>
<s> "Suddenly we heard the sound of firing, followed by yells from the natives on shore, and then we saw the recruiter-boat push out with a seemingly diminished crew </s>
<s> The mate's boat pulled quickly up, took her in tow, and presently brought her alongside, all her own crew being more or less hurt </s>
<s> It seems the natives had called them into the place on pretence of friendship </s>
<s> A crowd gathered about the stern of the boat, and several fellows even got into her </s>
<s> All of a sudden our men were attacked with clubs and tomahawks </s>
<s> The recruiter escaped the first blows aimed at him, making play with his fists until he had an opportunity to draw his revolver </s>
<s> 'Tom Sayers,' a Mare man, received a tomahawk blow on the head which laid the scalp open but did not penetrate his skull, fortunately </s>
<s> 'Bobby Towns,' another Mare boatman, had both his thumbs cut in warding off blows, one of them being so nearly severed from the hand that the doctors had to finish the operation </s>
<s> Lihu, a Lifu boy, the recruiter's special attendant, was cut and pricked in various places, but nowhere seriously </s>
<s> Jack, an unlucky Tanna recruit, who had been engaged to act as boatman, received an arrow through his forearm, the head of which--apiece of bone seven or eight inches long--was still in the limb, protruding from both sides, when the boats returned </s>
<s> The recruiter himself would have got off scot-free had not an arrow pinned one of his fingers to the loom of the steering-oar just as they were getting off </s>
<s> The fight had been short but sharp </s>
<s> The enemy lost two men, both shot dead" </s>
<s> The truth is, Captain Wawn furnishes such a crowd of instances of fatal encounters between natives and French and English recruiting-crews (for the French are in the business for the plantations of New Caledonia), that one is almost persuaded that recruiting is not thoroughly popular among the islanders; else why this bristling string of attacks and bloodcurdling slaughter </s>
<s> The captain lays it all to "Exeter Hall influence" </s>
<s> But for the meddling philanthropists, the native fathers and mothers would be fond of seeing their children carted into exile and now and then the grave, instead of weeping about it and trying to kill the kind recruiters </s>
<s> CHAPTER VI </s>
<s> He was as shy as a newspaper is when referring to its own merits </s>
<s> --Pudd'nhead Wilson's New Calendar </s>
<s> Captain Wawn is crystal-clear on one point: He does not approve of missionaries </s>
<s> They obstruct his business </s>
<s> They make "Recruiting," as he calls it ("Slave-Catching," as they call it in their frank way) a trouble when it ought to be just a picnic and a pleasure excursion </s>
<s> The missionaries have their opinion about the manner in which the Labor Traffic is conducted, and about the recruiter's evasions of the law of the Traffic, and about the traffic itself--and it is distinctly uncomplimentary to the Traffic and to everything connected with it, including the law for its regulation </s>
<s> Captain Wawn's book is of very recent date; I have by me a pamphlet of still later date--hot from the press, in fact--by Rev </s>
<s> Wm </s>
<s> Gray, a missionary; and the book and the pamphlet taken together make exceedingly interesting reading, to my mind </s>
<s> Interesting, and easy to understand--except in one detail, which I will mention presently </s>
<s> It is easy to understand why the Queensland sugar planter should want the Kanaka recruit: he is cheap </s>
<s> Very cheap, in fact </s>
<s> These are the figures paid by the planter: L20 to the recruiter for getting the Kanaka or "catching" him, as the missionary phrase goes; L3 to the Queensland government for "superintending" the importation; L5 deposited with the Government for the Kanaka's passage home when his three years are up, in case he shall live that long; about L25 to the Kanaka himself for three years' wages and clothing; total payment for the use of a man three years, L53; or, including diet, L60 </s>
<s> Altogether, a hundred dollars a year </s>
<s> One can understand why the recruiter is fond of the business; the recruit costs him a few cheap presents (given to the recruit's relatives, not to the recruit himself), and the recruit is worth L20 to the recruiter when delivered in Queensland </s>
<s> All this is clear enough; but the thing that is not clear is, what there is about it all to persuade the recruit </s>
<s> He is young and brisk; life at home in his beautiful island is one lazy, long holiday to him; or if he wants to work he can turn out a couple of bags of copra per week and sell it for four or five shillings a bag </s>
<s> In Queensland he must get up at dawn and work from eight to twelve hours a day in the canefields--in a much hotter climate than he is used to--and get less than four shillings a week for it </s>
<s> I cannot understand his willingness to go to Queensland </s>
<s> It is a deep puzzle to me </s>
<s> Here is the explanation, from the planter's point of view; at least I gather from the missionary's pamphlet that it is the planter's: "When he comes from his home he is a savage, pure and simple </s>
<s> He feels no shame at his nakedness and want of adornment </s>
<s> When he returns home he does so well dressed, sporting a Waterbury watch, collars, cuffs, boots, and jewelry </s>
<s> He takes with him one or more boxes--["Box" is English for trunk.]--well filled with clothing, a musical instrument or two, and perfumery and other articles of luxury he has learned to appreciate" </s>
<s> For just one moment we have a seeming flash of comprehension of, the Kanaka's reason for exiling himself: he goes away to acquire civilization </s>
<s> Yes, he was naked and not ashamed, now he is clothed and knows how to be ashamed; he was unenlightened; now he has a Waterbury watch; he was unrefined, now he has jewelry, and something to make him smell good; he was a nobody, a provincial, now he has been to far countries and can show off </s>
<s> It all looks plausible--for a moment </s>
<s> Then the missionary takes hold of this explanation and pulls it to pieces, and dances on it, and damages it beyond recognition </s>
<s> "Admitting that the foregoing description is the average one, the average sequel is this: The cuffs and collars, if used at all, are carried off by youngsters, who fasten them round the leg, just below the knee, as ornaments </s>
<s> The Waterbury, broken and dirty, finds its way to the trader, who gives a trifle for it; or the inside is taken out, the wheels strung on a thread and hung round the neck </s>
<s> Knives, axes, calico, and handkerchiefs are divided among friends, and there is hardly one of these apiece </s>
<s> The boxes, the keys often lost on the road home, can be bought for 2s </s>
<s> 6d </s>
<s> They are to be seen rotting outside in almost any shore village on Tanna </s>
<s> (I speak of what I have seen.) A returned Kanaka has been furiously angry with me because I would not buy his trousers, which he declared were just my fit </s>
<s> He sold them afterwards to one of my Aniwan teachers for 9d </s>
<s> worth of tobacco--a pair of trousers that probably cost him 8s </s>
<s> or 10s </s>
<s> in Queensland </s>
<s> A coat or shirt is handy for cold weather </s>
<s> The white handkerchiefs, the 'senet' (perfumery), the umbrella, and perhaps the hat, are kept </s>
<s> The boots have to take their chance, if they do not happen to fit the copra trader </s>
<s> 'Senet' on the hair, streaks of paint on the face, a dirty white handkerchief round the neck, strips of turtle shell in the ears, a belt, a sheath and knife, and an umbrella constitute the rig of returned Kanaka at home the day after landing" </s>
<s> A hat, an umbrella, a belt, a neckerchief </s>
<s> Otherwise stark naked </s>
<s> All in a day the hard-earned "civilization" has melted away to this </s>
<s> And even these perishable things must presently go </s>
<s> Indeed, there is but a single detail of his civilization that can be depended on to stay by him: according to the missionary, he has learned to swear </s>
<s> This is art, and art is long, as the poet says </s>
<s> In all countries the laws throw light upon the past </s>
<s> The Queensland law for the regulation of the Labor Traffic is a confession </s>
<s> It is a confession that the evils charged by the missionaries upon the traffic had existed in the past, and that they still existed when the law was made </s>
<s> The missionaries make a further charge: that the law is evaded by the recruiters, and that the Government Agent sometimes helps them to do it </s>
<s> Regulation 31 reveals two things: that sometimes a young fool of a recruit gets his senses back, after being persuaded to sign away his liberty for three years, and dearly wants to get out of the engagement and stay at home with his own people; and that threats, intimidation, and force are used to keep him on board the recruiting-ship, and to hold him to his contract </s>
<s> Regulation 31 forbids these coercions </s>
<s> The law requires that he shall be allowed to go free; and another clause of it requires the recruiter to set him ashore--per boat, because of the prevalence of sharks </s>
<s> Testimony from Rev </s>
<s> Mr Gray: "There are 'wrinkles' for taking the penitent Kanaka </s>
<s> My first experience of the Traffic was a case of this kind in 1884 </s>
<s> A vessel anchored just out of sight of our station, word was brought to me that some boys were stolen, and the relatives wished me to go and get them back </s>
<s> The facts were, as I found, that six boys had recruited, had rushed into the boat, the Government Agent informed me </s>
<s> They had all 'signed'; and, said the Government Agent, 'on board they shall remain' </s>
<s> I was assured that the six boys were of age and willing to go </s>
<s> Yet on getting ready to leave the ship I found four of the lads ready to come ashore in the boat </s>
<s> This I forbade </s>
<s> One of them jumped into the water and persisted in coming ashore in my boat </s>
<s> When appealed to, the Government Agent suggested that we go and leave him to be picked up by the ship's boat, a quarter mile distant at the time" </s>
<s> The law and the missionaries feel for the repentant recruit--and properly, one may be permitted to think, for he is only a youth and ignorant and persuadable to his hurt--but sympathy for him is not kept in stock by the recruiter </s>
<s> Rev </s>
<s> Mr Gray says: "A captain many years in the traffic explained to me how a penitent could betaken </s>
<s> 'When a boy jumps overboard we just take a boat and pull ahead of him, then lie between him and the shore </s>
<s> If he has not tired himself swimming, and passes the boat, keep on heading him in this way </s>
<s> The dodge rarely fails </s>
<s> The boy generally tires of swimming, gets into the boat of his own accord, and goes quietly on board" </s>
<s> Yes, exhaustion is likely to make a boy quiet </s>
<s> If the distressed boy had been the speaker's son, and the captors savages, the speaker would have been surprised to see how differently the thing looked from the new point of view; however, it is not our custom to put ourselves in the other person's place </s>
<s> Somehow there is something pathetic about that disappointed young savage's resignation </s>
<s> I must explain, here, that in the traffic dialect, "boy" does not always mean boy; it means a youth above sixteen years of age </s>
<s> That is by Queensland law the age of consent, though it is held that recruiters allow themselves some latitude in guessing at ages </s>
<s> Captain Wawn of the free spirit chafes under the annoyance of "cast-iron regulations" </s>
<s> They and the missionaries have poisoned his life </s>
<s> He grieves for the good old days, vanished to come no more </s>
<s> See him weep; hear him cuss between the lines </s>
<s> "For a long time we were allowed to apprehend and detain all deserters who had signed the agreement on board ship, but the 'cast-iron' regulations of the Act of 1884 put a stop to that, allowing the Kanaka to sign the agreement for three years' service, travel about in the ship in receipt of the regular rations, cadge all he could, and leave when he thought fit, so long as he did not extend his pleasure trip to Queensland" </s>
<s> Rev </s>
<s> Mr Gray calls this same restrictive cast-iron law a "farce" </s>
<s> "There is as much cruelty and injustice done to natives by acts that are legal as by deeds unlawful </s>
<s> The regulations that exist are unjust and inadequate--unjust and inadequate they must ever be" </s>
<s> He furnishes his reasons for his position, but they are too long for reproduction here </s>
<s> However, if the most a Kanaka advantages himself by a three-years course in civilization in Queensland, is a necklace and an umbrella and a showy imperfection in the art of swearing, it must be that all the profit of the traffic goes to the white man </s>
<s> This could be twisted into a plausible argument that the traffic ought to be squarely abolished </s>
<s> However, there is reason for hope that that can be left alone to achieve itself </s>
<s> It is claimed that the traffic will depopulate its sources of supply within the next twenty or thirty years </s>
<s> Queensland is a very healthy place for white people--death-rate 12 in 1,000 of the population --but the Kanaka death-rate is away above that </s>
<s> The vital statistics for 1893 place it at 52; for 1894 (Mackay district), 68 </s>
<s> The first six months of the Kanaka's exile are peculiarly perilous for him because of the rigors of the new climate </s>
<s> The death-rate among the new men has reached as high as 180 in the 1,000 </s>
<s> In the Kanaka's native home his death-rate is 12 in time of peace, and 15 in time of war </s>
<s> Thus exile to Queensland--with the opportunity to acquire civilization, an umbrella, and a pretty poor quality of profanity--is twelve times as deadly for him as war </s>
<s> Common Christian charity, common humanity, does seem to require, not only that these people be returned to their homes, but that war, pestilence, and famine be introduced among them for their preservation </s>
<s> Concerning these Pacific isles and their peoples an eloquent prophet spoke long years ago--five and fifty years ago </s>
<s> In fact, he spoke a little too early </s>
<s> Prophecy is a good line of business, but it is full of risks </s>
<s> This prophet was the Right Rev </s>
<s> M </s>
<s> Russell, LL.D., D.C.L., of Edinburgh: "Is the tide of civilization to roll only to the foot of the Rocky Mountains, and is the sun of knowledge to set at last in the waves of the Pacific </s>
<s> No; the mighty day of four thousand years is drawing to its close; the sun of humanity has performed its destined course; but long ere its setting rays are extinguished in the west, its ascending beams have glittered on the isles of the eastern seas </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> And now we see the race of Japhet setting forth to people the isles, and the seeds of another Europe and a second England sown in the regions of the sun </s>
<s> But mark the words of the prophecy: 'He shall dwell in the tents of Shem, and Canaan shall be his servant' </s>

<s> Very well, Bright Improvement has arrived, you see, with her civilization, and her Waterbury, and her umbrella, and her third-quality profanity, and her humanizing-not-destroying machinery, and her hundred-and-eighty death-rate, and everything is going along just as handsome </s>
<s> But the prophet that speaks last has an advantage over the pioneer in the business </s>
<s> Rev </s>
<s> Mr Gray says: "What I am concerned about is that we as a Christian nation should wipe out these races to enrich ourselves" </s>

<s> It generally demoralizes and always impoverishes the Kanaka, deprives him of his citizenship, and depopulates the islands fitted to his home </s>
<s> "2 </s>
<s> It is felt to lower the dignity of the white agricultural laborer in Queensland, and beyond a doubt it lowers his wages there </s>
<s> "3 </s>
<s> The whole system is fraught with danger to Australia and the islands on the score of health </s>
<s> "4 </s>
<s> On social and political grounds the continuance of the Queensland Kanaka Labor Traffic must be a barrier to the true federation of the Australian colonies </s>
<s> "5 </s>

<s> "6 </s>

<s> The Gospel requires us to help the weak, but the Kanaka is fleeced and trodden down </s>
<s> "7 </s>
<s> The bed-rock of this Traffic is that the life and liberty of a black man are of less value than those of a white man </s>
